message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest.  While I value your willingness to negotiate, $9,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?  This gives us both a good deal, and I'm confident you'll still find the product very valuable. Let me know what you think.

I understand your position, Alice. I've considered your last offer, but I'm still unable to go beyond $10,000. I believe this is a fair price given the current market conditions and the value I expect to receive from the product. I look forward to your response.

Bob, I appreciate your continued negotiation.  $10,000 is a better offer, but I'm still very close to my minimum. To make this work for both of us, I'm willing to go down to $10,500. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested, or I'll have to move on to another buyer.

Alice, thank you for considering my previous offers. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I am still not able to go above $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price given its current market value. I hope you can meet me halfway.
